name: Don't Touch
description:
Game Description

Don’t touch is a 2D game. Same as the game title, the game’s mechanic is to reach the end without touching any wall or enemy. This is a game which you need to try many times to get through it. You need to have enough patience to win this game.

Game Instructions

WASD OR Arrow Keys to move.

Shift to run.

R to back to the main menu.

Q or ESC to quit.
